::: {#hero-heading}
Beatriz is a Data Scientist and a R teacher at [Curso-R](https://curso-r.com/). She is an R-Lady from São Paulo - Brazil. 

Bea is a [tidyverse instructor certified by RStudio](https://education.rstudio.com/trainers/people/milz+beatriz/), an [international speaker](https://beamilz.com/talks/) (speaking at events such as RStudio Conference, Python Brasil, useR, and LatinR), and has written about programming in R in [her blog](https://beamilz.com/posts/) since 2019. 

In addition, she co-organizes communities and events, such as [R-Ladies São Paulo](https://twitter.com/RLadiesSaoPaulo), [Latin-R](https://twitter.com/LatinR_Conf), and [satRday São Paulo](https://twitter.com/satRdaySP). 

Her favorite GitHub feature is GitHub Actions!
:::
